import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Flame, Lock, Users, TrendingUp, Coins, Shield, ChevronDown, ChevronUp, Zap, Target, Clock, PieChart, BarChart3, ArrowRight, Check, Hammer, Wallet, Gift, Building2, Timer, Gem, Play, Gamepad2, Trophy, Sparkles, CircleDollarSign, Layers, Map, Swords, Crown } from 'lucide-react'; import { PieChart as RechartsPie, Pie, Cell, ResponsiveContainer, Tooltip } from 'recharts'; // Data const tokenAllocation = [ { name: 'Master Editions (Bound)', value: 58.2, amount: '2,380,533,198', color: '#14F195', desc: 'Locked to 3,500 NFT holders' }, { name: 'SOV Mining Pool', value: 12.2, amount: '500,000,000', color: '#9945FF', desc: 'Fair distribution via SOV mining' }, { name: 'Team (6mo Cliff + 1yr Vest)', value: 10.0, amount: '408,948,133', color: '#00D1FF', desc: '18 months total lock' }, { name: 'Marketing/Partners', value: 4.9, amount: '200,000,000', color: '#FF6B6B', desc: 'CEX & partnerships only' }, { name: 'Genesis Quest', value: 2.4, amount: '100,000,000', color: '#FFE66D', desc: 'Staking rewards' }, ]; const burnHistory = [ { name: 'Bonding Curve Burns', amount: '2,119,466,802', percent: '21.2%', desc: 'Already burned from early mechanism' }, { name: 'DEX Allocation', amount: '2,000,000,000', percent: '20.0%', desc: 'Not needed - mining creates liquidity' }, { name: 'Marketing Excess', amount: '1,700,000,000', percent: '17.0%', desc: 'Keeping only 200M for actual use' }, { name: 'Team Reduction', amount: '591,051,867', percent: '5.9%', desc: 'Proportional cut to maintain 10%' }, ]; const solDistribution = [ { name: 'Winners', percent: 88, color: '#14F195', desc: 'Split among winning block stakers' }, { name: 'Buybacks (Burned)', percent: 7, color: '#FF6B6B', desc: 'Buy QUEST & burn forever' }, { name: 'QUEST Stakers', percent: 2, color: '#9945FF', desc: 'Anyone staking QUEST earns SOL' }, { name: 'ME Stakers', percent: 1, color: '#00D1FF', desc: 'Proportional to BPS share from staking' }, { name: 'Motherlode Pool', percent: 2, color: '#FFE66D', desc: '1/625 chance SOL jackpot' }, ]; const vestingTimeline = [ { month: 'Month 0-6', status: 'Cliff Period', unlocked: '0 QUEST', detail: 'Team fully locked - maximum alignment' }, { month: 'Month 7', status: 'Vesting Begins', unlocked: '~7.86M/week', detail: 'Weekly unlocks start after cliff' }, { month: 'Month 7-18', status: 'Linear Vesting', unlocked: '~31.5M/month', detail: '52 weeks of gradual release' }, { month: 'End of Month 18', status: 'Fully Vested', unlocked: '408.9M (100%)', detail: 'Complete - 18 months from TGE' }, ]; const keyMetrics = [ { label: 'Total Supply', value: '4.09B', sub: 'QUEST' }, { label: 'Burned Forever', value: '59.1%', sub: '5.91B QUEST' }, { label: 'Community Share', value: '70.4%', sub: 'Fair Distribution' }, { label: 'Team Lock', value: '18 Months', sub: '6mo Cliff + 1yr Vest' }, ]; const comparisonData = [ { project: 'Critters Quest', burn: '59.1%', lock: '6mo + 1yr', fair: true, deflationary: true }, { project: 'Typical GameFi', burn: '0-10%', lock: '3-6mo', fair: false, deflationary: false }, { project: 'Fair Launch', burn: '0-20%', lock: '0-12mo', fair: true, deflationary: null }, { project: 'Memecoins', burn: '0-50%', lock: 'None', fair: null, deflationary: false }, ]; // Journey/Roadmap data const journeyPhases = [ { phase: 'Phase 1', title: 'Foundation', period: 'Q4 2024 - Q3 2025', status: 'completed', items: [ 'Master Edition NFT sale (3,500 sold out)', 'Genesis Quest staking launched', 'Game beta live for ME holders', 'Tokenomics finalized', 'Community growing organically' ] }, { phase: 'Phase 2', title: 'TGE Launch', period: 'Q1 2026', status: 'current', items: [ 'Execute 59% supply burn', 'Deploy ORE mining contracts', 'Launch QUEST staking (earn 2% SOL)', 'Activate buyback mechanism', 'Token trading begins' ] }, { phase: 'Phase 3', title: 'Game Launch', period: 'Q1-Q2 2026', status: 'upcoming', items: [ 'Open beta to Public Edition holders', 'Public Edition minting goes live', 'Game sinks activated (20% to treasury)', 'Competitive seasons begin', 'Alliance & territory systems' ] }, { phase: 'Phase 4', title: 'Expansion', period: 'Q2-Q4 2026', status: 'upcoming', items: [ 'Major CEX listings', 'Tournament system with prizes', 'Mobile app (iOS/Android)', 'New character types & maps', 'Sustainable equilibrium reached' ] } ]; // How it works steps const howItWorksSteps = [ { step: 1, title: 'Get Master Edition NFT', desc: 'Own 1 of 3,500 unique NFTs with bound QUEST tokens', icon: Gem, color: '#14F195' }, { step: 2, title: 'Stake in Genesis Quest', desc: 'Unlock 0.1%/day of your bound tokens + boosts', icon: Lock, color: '#9945FF' }, { step: 3, title: 'Contribute to Mining Pool', desc: 'Add unlocked QUEST to earn perpetual 1% SOL revenue', icon: Hammer, color: '#00D1FF' }, { step: 4, title: 'Mine & Earn', desc: 'Stake SOL on 5x5 grid, win SOL + QUEST every minute', icon: Coins, color: '#FFE66D' }, { step: 5, title: 'Stake QUEST', desc: 'Earn 2% of all mining SOL volume passively', icon: TrendingUp, color: '#FF6B6B' }, { step: 6, title: 'Play the Game', desc: 'Use QUEST in 4X strategy game, burns feed treasury', icon: Gamepad2, color: '#14F195' } ]; // Components const StatCard = ({ icon: Icon, label, value, sub, gradient }) => (
{label}
{value}
{sub}
); const Section = ({ id, title, icon: Icon, children, className = '' }) => (

{title}

{children}
); const ProgressBar = ({ percent, color, label }) => (
{label} {percent}%
); const Accordion = ({ title, children, defaultOpen = false }) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(defaultOpen); return (
{isOpen &&
{children}
}
); }; const FeatureCard = ({ icon: Icon, title, description }) => (

{title}

{description}

); const Nav = ({ activeSection }) => { const sections = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview' }, { id: 'ecosystem', label: 'Ecosystem' }, { id: 'tge', label: 'TGE & Mining' }, { id: 'tokenomics', label: 'Tokenomics' }, { id: 'game', label: '4X Game' }, ]; return (
Critters Quest $QUEST
{sections.map(section => ( {section.label} ))}
); }; function App() { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); React.useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const sections = ['overview', 'ecosystem', 'tge', 'tokenomics', 'game', 'roadmap']; for (const section of sections) { const el = document.getElementById(section); if (el) { const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect(); if (rect.top <= 150 && rect.bottom >= 150) { setActiveSection(section); break; } } } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Hero */}
A New Way to Launch

Critters Quest Ecosystem

A 4X Strategy Game with a revolutionary fair-launch TGE via ORE Mining Protocol. No presales. No VC dumps. Just fair distribution through gameplay and mining.

{/* Three Pillars */}

SOV Mining (TGE)

Our TGE method via ORE Protocol. Fair token distribution + perpetual revenue.

The Launch Mechanism

4X Strategy Game

Explore, Expand, Exploit, Exterminate. Real gameplay with real rewards.

The Game

$QUEST Token

59% burned pre-TGE. Utility across mining, staking, and gameplay.

The Token
{/* Key Stats */}
{keyMetrics.map((metric, i) => ( ))}
{/* ECOSYSTEM OVERVIEW */}

Three interconnected systems that create sustainable value for all participants.

{/* Ecosystem Flow Diagram */}

SOV Mining

TGE via ORE Protocol

Fair token distribution
Earn SOL + QUEST
7% buyback burns
QUEST flows
$QUEST
Utility Token
20% to treasury

4X Game

Play & Earn

Spend QUEST in-game
Earn through gameplay
20% feeds SOV treasury
{/* Who Benefits */}

Who Benefits?

ME Holders
  • 1% SOV mining SOL (by BPS share)
  • 50% base Clone revenues
  • Locked QUEST on NFT
QUEST Stakers
  • Stake QUEST Earn SOL (2%)
  • Passive income
  • No gameplay required
Miners
  • Win SOL from rounds
  • Earn QUEST from SOV mining
  • Motherlode jackpots
Gamers
  • Earn QUEST playing
  • Competitive rewards
  • NFT progression
{/* TGE & SOV MINING - THE LAUNCH MECHANISM */}

A Non-Traditional Token Launch

A community-first Pre-Mine followed by SOV Mining (built on ORE Protocol). Fair distribution. Perpetual utility. No VC dumps.

Pre-Mine
20M QUEST for 2,500 SOL
No VCs
No dump schedules
Fair Mining
Everyone can participate
{/* Pre-Mine Details */}

Pre-Mine: 20M QUEST for 2,500 SOL

80% Liquidity (2,000 SOL)

Creates the initial QUEST/SOL liquidity pool for trading. Ensures healthy market from day one.

20% ME Contributors (500 SOL)

Distributed to MEs who contributed QUEST from Genesis staking, proportional to their BPS share.

Community-first: Pre-Mine rewards those who contributed to the mining pool
{/* How Mining Works */}

How SOV Mining Works

{[ { step: '1', title: 'Stake SOL', desc: 'Deploy SOL on any block in the 5x5 grid', icon: Coins }, { step: '2', title: 'Wait 1 Min', desc: 'Each round lasts 60 seconds', icon: Timer }, { step: '3', title: 'Random Winner', desc: 'Provably fair selection picks winning block', icon: Target }, { step: '4', title: 'Collect Rewards', desc: 'Winners get SOL profit + QUEST emissions', icon: Trophy }, ].map((item, i) => { const Icon = item.icon; return (
{item.step}

{item.title}

{item.desc}

); })}
{/* SOL Distribution & Round Structure */}

SOL Distribution Per Round

{solDistribution.map((item, i) => (
{item.name} - {item.desc}
{item.percent}%
))}

Round Structure

Duration 1 minute per round
Grid Size 5x5 (25 blocks)
Initial Emission ~951 QUEST/round
Refining Fee 10% on claims
Motherlode Chance 1/625 (SOL jackpot)
{/* Revenue Streams from Mining */}

SOV Mining Creates Multiple Revenue Streams

ME Stakers
Earn 1% SOL

1% of SOV mining SOL distributed proportionally based on each ME's BPS (basis points) share from Genesis staking.

QUEST Stakers
Earn 2% in SOL

Stake $QUEST Earn $SOL. 2% of all SOV mining volume paid in SOL to stakers. Passive income from protocol activity.

Buyback & Burn
7% Burns QUEST

7% of each round buys QUEST from market and burns it forever. The only burn mechanism.

{/* Example Calculation */}
You stake 0.1 SOL on Block #13:
Total on Block #13: 2 SOL (from 10 players)
Your share of block: 5%
If Block #13 wins:
Total losing SOL: 8 SOL (from other 24 blocks)
Winners get 88%: 7.04 SOL distributed
Your 5% share: 0.352 SOL
Your profit: 0.352 - 0.1 = 0.252 SOL = $35 profit
Plus QUEST: 951 5% = 48 QUEST
Total earnings: $35+ from 0.1 SOL stake
{/* TOKENOMICS */}
{/* Pre-TGE Burn Banner */}
59.1% Burned
5.91B QUEST destroyed before TGE
Final Supply
4.09B QUEST
{/* Token Allocation - Visual Bars Instead of Pie */}

Token Allocation (4.09B QUEST)

{tokenAllocation.map((item, i) => (
{item.name}
{item.value}% ({item.amount})
{item.desc}
))}
{/* Team Vesting */}

Team Vesting: 6-Month Cliff + 1-Year Vesting

{vestingTimeline.map((item, i) => (
{item.month}
{item.unlocked}
{item.detail}
))}
{/* What Was Burned */}
{burnHistory.map((burn, i) => (
{burn.name} {burn.percent}
{burn.desc}
))}
{/* 4X GAME */}

A real game with real utility. Earn resources through skilled gameplay, swap for QUEST via natural price discovery.

{/* 4X Explanation */}
{[ { letter: 'eX', word: 'plore', desc: 'Discover territories and resources', icon: Map, color: '#FFB84A' }, { letter: 'eX', word: 'pand', desc: 'Grow your empire across the map', icon: Layers, color: '#1EA495' }, { letter: 'eX', word: 'ploit', desc: 'Harvest resources for advantage', icon: Hammer, color: '#74FDE7' }, { letter: 'eX', word: 'terminate', desc: 'Defeat rivals in strategic combat', icon: Swords, color: '#E7EF88' }, ].map((item, i) => { const Icon = item.icon; return (
{item.letter} {item.word}

{item.desc}

); })}
{/* Token-Bound Accounts */}

Token-Bound Accounts (TBA)

Your NFT owns its own wallet. All QUEST, resources, tools, and equipment are stored on the NFT itself, not in your personal wallet. When you sell the NFT, everything goes with it.

Critter NFT = Own Wallet Town NFT = Own Wallet True Asset Ownership
{/* Economic Sinks */}

Economic Sinks (Where QUEST Leaves Circulation)

{[ { title: 'Movement Costs', desc: 'Every action on the world map costs QUEST', icon: Map, highlight: false }, { title: 'Upgrades & Crafting', desc: 'Buildings, tools, gems, potions', icon: Hammer, highlight: false }, { title: 'Building Control', desc: 'Stake QUEST to control strategic structures', icon: Building2, highlight: false }, { title: 'Clone Consumption', desc: 'Burn Clones to promote characters (permanent)', icon: Flame, highlight: true }, { title: 'Promotions', desc: 'Consume Clones to power up characters', icon: TrendingUp, highlight: true }, { title: 'Leveling Up', desc: 'Spend QUEST to level characters & towns', icon: Sparkles, highlight: false }, { title: 'Repairing', desc: 'Fix damaged tools and equipment', icon: Hammer, highlight: false }, { title: 'Rent (Fresh Finds)', desc: 'Pay for temporary bonuses & positioning', icon: Clock, highlight: false }, { title: 'Tool Destruction', desc: 'Tools can break, requiring re-crafting', icon: Zap, highlight: false }, ].map((item, i) => { const Icon = item.icon; return (
{item.title}

{item.desc}

); })}
{/* Clone Economy Flywheel */}

The Clone Economy Flywheel (Deflationary)

1
Mint

Players mint Clones from Master Editions

2
Trade

Buy/sell on secondary (ME earns royalties)

3
Consume

Burn Clones to promote characters

4
Scarcity

Reduced supply higher floor prices

Master Editions cannot be consumed only Clones burn, creating perpetual demand
{/* NFT Types */}

Master Edition NFTs

SOLD OUT
  • 3,500 unique characters
  • Locked QUEST (spend in-game OR unlock via Genesis)
  • Base 50% of all Clone revenues (mint + secondary)
  • 1% of SOV mining SOL (proportional to BPS)
  • Cannot be consumed (permanent)

Clone NFTs (Public Edition)

COMING Q1 2026
  • Clone any Master Edition to play
  • Affordable entry (ME sets price)
  • Full gameplay access
  • Can be consumed to promote others
  • Creates deflationary pressure
{/* The Swap - Resource Economy */}

The Swap: Resource QUEST Economy

Players don't earn QUEST directly they earn resources through skilled gameplay. All resources can be swapped for QUEST via 100+ liquidity pools (Meteora DLMM).

100+
Resource Pools
Natural
Price Discovery
Skill
= Earnings
{/* Footer */}
Critters Quest $QUEST
Document Version 1.1 December 2025
Network: Solana Website: critters.quest
); } export default App;
